  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085897</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Bringing current science into the classroom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Holen der aktuellen Wissenschaft in das 
Klassenzimmer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduire la science actuelle dans la salle de 
classe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trazendo a ciência atual na sala de aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introducendo scienza corrente nell'aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να φέρει την παρούσα επιστήμη στην τάξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Traer ciencia actual en la sala de clase</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">How your students can experience current environmental research without leaving the classroom.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie Ihre Kursteilnehmer aktuelles Klima erfahren 
können, erforschen Sie, ohne das Klassenzimmer zu verlassen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment vos étudiants peuvent éprouver ambiant 
actuel recherchez sans partir de la salle de classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como seus estudantes podem experimentar ambiental 
atual pesquise sem sair da sala de aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come i vostri allievi possono sperimentare 
ambientale corrente ricerchi senza lasciare l'aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς οι σπουδαστές σας μπορούν να δοκιμάσουν την 
παρούσα περιβαλλοντική έρευνα χωρίς αναχώρηση της τάξης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo sus estudiantes pueden experimentar 
ambiental actual investigue sin salir de la sala de clase.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
